text: For teens, the first day back at school brings a plethora of emotions, from excitement to dread and everything in between. In her second work for Converse, Millie Bobby Brown (aka, Eleven from Stranger Things) tries to capture all those feels in 32 fun reaction GIFs as part of a new digital campaign from Big Spaceship.
title: Millie Bobby Brown Has All the Back-to-School Feels in 32 Excellent GIFs From Converse
